definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 葛萊美獎|葛莱美奖
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: These are people who do not just win a tennis match, they do not just win a Grammy.
sentences.chinese: 这些人可并没有赢了网球比赛，或是刚得了格莱美奖。

sentences.english: Certain musical artists have voiced personal issues with the nature of the Grammys.
sentences.chinese: 某些音乐艺术家们表示，个人问题的性质格莱美奖。
他还获得了13个格莱美奖。

sentences.english: Smith is a three-time Grammy Award winner, and he has earned 34 Dove Awards.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔是三届格莱美奖得主，他赢得了34个白鸽奖。

sentences.english: It also won eight Grammy Awards and seven American Music Awards.
sentences.chinese: 它还赢得了8个格莱美奖和七个美国音乐奖。

sentences.english: To date, Berklee alumni have won a total of 176 Grammy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，伯克利校友共获得了176格莱美奖。

sentences.english: Lena Horne was presented the Grammy Award for Lifetime Achievement in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 利纳霍恩是提出了终身成就奖1989年格莱美奖。

sentences.english: It's worth the Grammy Award it won.
sentences.chinese: 它得了格莱美奖真当之无愧啊。

sentences.english: He also won four Grammy Awards for his albums.
sentences.chinese: 他的专辑四次获得格莱美奖。

sentences.english: The Grammy for me is credibility.
sentences.chinese: 格莱美奖对我而言是真实可信的。

sentences.english: The song earned Meat Loaf a Grammy Award for Best Rock Vocal Performance, Solo.
sentences.chinese: 歌曲赢得了格莱美奖最佳摇滚声乐表演，单独肉块。

definition: Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 格萊美獎|格莱美奖

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: nickname of American singer Bruno Mars
Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
